title: Gmail API Get Profile Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the Get Profile operation in Gmail API

historyId.description: The ID of the mailbox's current history record.

messagesTotal.description: The total number of messages in the mailbox.

threadsTotal.description: The total number of threads in the mailbox.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
